languages.text: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно. За счет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, как и в случае с базовым здоровьем, эта прибавка может быть увеличена на <u>(10 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: The character gains an additional 12 wounds. Those wounds are further increased by Toughness, gaining +<u>(10 × Toughness bonus)</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.
The character gains an additional 12 wounds. Those wounds are further increased by Toughness, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH bonus)</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

languages.text: El personaje gana 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} adicionales. Estas heridas aumentan en función de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, incrementándose un +<u>(10 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES)</u> %, igual que las heridas básicas.
languages.original_text: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

traits.locale_text: El personaje gana 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} adicionales. Estas heridas aumentan en función de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, incrementándose un +<u>(10 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES)</u> %, igual que las heridas básicas.

languages.text: このキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を追加で12得る。この体力は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}に応じてさらに増加する。基本体力と同様、+<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%増加する。
languages.original_text: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を追加で12得る。この体力は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}に応じてさらに増加する。基本体力と同様、+<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%増加する。

languages.text: 角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}提高12点。此生命值加成还会受到角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}影响，额外生命值加成为<u>（10×坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}属性{/g}）</u>%，增加方式与基本生命值相同。
languages.original_text: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

traits.locale_text: 角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}提高12点。此生命值加成还会受到角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}韧性{/g}影响，额外生命值加成为<u>（10×TGH{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}属性{/g}）</u>%，增加方式与基本生命值相同。

languages.text: Der Charakter erhält zusätzliche 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. Diese Wunden werden wie die Grundwunden um +<u>(10 × ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} erhöht.
languages.original_text: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter erhält zusätzliche 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. Diese Wunden werden zusätzlich um {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} erhöht, und zwar um +<u>(10 × ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u>%, entsprechend den Grundwunden.

languages.text: Le personnage obtient 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} supplémentaires dans sa réserve. Ce nombre de blessures augmente encore grâce à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, qui s'accroît de +<u>(10 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'END)</u> %, de la même manière que les blessures de base.
languages.original_text: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage acquiert 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} supplémentaires dans sa réserve. Ce nombre de blessures augmente encore grâce à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, qui s'accroît de +<u>(10 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de RES)</u> %, de la même manière que les blessures de base.

languages.text: Персонаж получает 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно. За счет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, как и в случае с базовым здоровьем, эта прибавка может быть увеличена на <u>(10 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН)</u>%.
languages.original_text: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно. За счет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, как и в случае с базовым здоровьем, эта прибавка может быть увеличена на <u>(10 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН)</u>%.

Персонаж получает 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно. За счет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, как и в случае с базовым здоровьем, эта прибавка может быть увеличена на <u>(10 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН)</u>%.

languages.text: Karakter, ilave 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliği bu sağlık miktarına etki eder ve sağlık puanları, temel sağlık puanlarında olduğu gibi +%<u>(10 × DAY {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar artar.
languages.original_text: The character gains an additional 12 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Those wounds are further increased by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, increasing by +<u>(10 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%, in the same way as basic wounds.
